title: What is Pull Request ?
text: Pull Request is the way Github provides for author of the code to share his/her code with others, and to allow others to take a look at your code before you merge it to integration branch and leave comments.

title: Top 5 best Google Chrome Extensions for developers
text: 1. Usersnap, 2.  Web Developer, 3. Hiver, 4. f19N Obtrusive Live Test, 5. Window Resizer for Developer.

title: Programming Is Learned Faster With These 7 Tips - Berkeley BootCamp
text: 1. Focus on the Fundamentals, 2. Learn to Ask for Help, 3. Put Your Knowledge into Action, 4. Learn How to Code by Hand, 5. Do More Than Just Read Sample Code, 6. Check out Online Coding Resources, 7. Know When to Step Away and Take a Break .
